---
title: "Requirements"
---

To start this lab, you'll need the following environments:

:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to meet all requirements.
:::

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `prompt` and Visual Studio Code
- **Environment**: A folder on your machine called *prompt*, an OpenAI-API key and an environment file
